translations: n.四叶草，幸运草（clover 的复数形式）；苜蓿类

phrs.translation: 四叶苜蓿（等于four-leaved clover）；幸运草

sentences.sentence: Who grows the four-leaf clovers in June?
sentences.translation: 是让幸运的三叶草，在六月里长得丰茂？

sentences.sentence: Because without you by my side, so even the clovers represents luck has been broken.
sentences.translation: 因为没有你在我身边，所以即使是代表着幸运的四叶草也被折断了。

sentences.sentence: If you're dreaming of good fortune in lotterydraw, forget about four leaf clovers - and look at your name.
sentences.translation: 如果买彩票想中大奖，别指望四叶草能给你带来好运，还是看看你自己的名字吧。
